experience.title: What you'll experience concretely with EduPro

quality.title: Quality Content
quality.description: Courses in multiple formats (HD videos, texts, audio, infographics) with French/English subtitles. Expert trainers who explain clearly. Optimal duration: 10-15 min per module.
quality.benefit: Learn according to your preferred style, at your own pace, without getting bored.

practical.title: Practical Exercises
practical.description: After each module, practice with concrete exercises and real projects. No pure theory, you build your portfolio.
practical.benefit: Prove your skills to recruiters with concrete achievements.

quizzes.title: Quizzes and Assessments
quizzes.description: Interactive quizzes after each section to validate your learning. Immediate feedback. Visible progress in real-time.
quizzes.benefit: Identify your strengths and areas for improvement.

community.title: Community and Support
community.description: Join learning groups with other learners. Ask your questions, share your projects, help each other.
community.benefit: Learn faster thanks to collective intelligence.

certifications.title: Certificates that open doors
certifications.subtitle: Each Skill Pack concludes with a proven skills certification created in co-certification with experts. Our certificates are verifiable and give you a competitive advantage.

verifiable.title: Verifiable
verifiable.description: Each certificate has a unique number and QR code. Recruiters can verify its authenticity online in seconds.
verifiable.impact: Total employer confidence, zero fraud possible.

coCertified.title: Co-certified
coCertified.description: Our certifications are created in co-certification with recognized experts. Each certification validates specific practical skills.
coCertified.impact: Maximum credibility, validation by industry peers.

shareable.title: Shareable
shareable.description: Add your certificates to your LinkedIn profile in 1 click. Display them on your digital CV. Impress recruiters and network.

evolutive.title: Evolutive
evolutive.description: Accumulate several certifications and create your expertise badge. Become 'Certified EduPro Data Analyst' or 'Expert Business Developer'.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before starting

account.q: How do I create my account?
account.a: It's very simple: Click on 'Create my free account', enter email + password, choose your country, validate your email. Total duration: 2 minutes. No credit card needed to start.

payment.q: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.a: We accept Mobile Money (Orange Money, Wave, MTN, M-Pesa), credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), and bank transfers. No credit card required if you pay with Mobile Money!

lifetime.q: Do I have lifetime access to purchased training?
lifetime.a: It depends on the training. Some offer lifetime access, others a limited duration (e.g., 6 months, 1 year). Access conditions are clearly indicated on each training's page.

formats.a: We offer two formats: Self-paced (asynchronous) - learn 24/7 at your own pace, or Cohort sessions (hybrid) - group with live sessions and direct interaction. Each training clearly indicates its format.

prerequisites.a: It depends on the training. Each course indicates its required level (beginner, intermediate, advanced) and prerequisites. Beginner training usually has no prerequisites.

languages.a: No! We offer content in French, English, and some local languages. The platform interface is in French and English. Each course's language is clearly indicated.

mobile.q: Can I learn from my phone?
mobile.a: Yes! EduPro is 100% mobile-friendly with optimized interface, adaptive videos, and offline mode. 78% of our learners mainly use their smartphone!

offline.q: What happens if I don't always have Internet?
offline.a: No problem! Offline mode allows downloading videos and viewing content without connection. We've thought about connectivity reality in Africa with bandwidth optimization.

quality.a: Yes! Created according to highest standards: co-certified with experts, validating practical measurable skills, aligned with real market needs, regularly updated.

employment.q: Does EduPro help find a job?
employment.a: Yes! We support with proven skills certificates, project portfolio, and active professional community. We develop partnerships with companies to facilitate recruitment.

updated.a: Yes! Major revisions every 6-12 months, continuous content additions, corrections as soon as reported. Digital evolves fast, we ensure you always learn current skills.

countries.q: In which countries is EduPro available?
countries.a: Currently: Senegal, Ivory Coast, Rwanda. Accessible from anywhere, even other African countries.

friends.a: Yes, it's encouraged! Create private study groups, share notes and projects, discuss in groups. Learning in groups increases motivation and promotes mutual help!
